document_data.name: Ample Chalice
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ample Chalice''' was a rowdy tavern found in the fabled city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Location: It was located at the intersection of [[Moonshadows Street]] and  [[Scatterhorn Street]], in the [[Sheshyrinnam]] district of the city.
document_data.Services: The Ample Chalice was one of the favorite haunts of the [[Akh'Velahr]].
document_data.History: The boisterous [[Arnarra Gildenguard]] won ownership of the tavern in a game of chance. It quickly garnered a lot of business, becoming the tavern of choice for [[Ilphas Miritar]], son of the city's Lord-Speaker.
